  • Method Details

    • CheckCommonGoal

      public int CheckCommonGoal(BOOKSHELF bookshelf, boolean goal1reached, boolean goal2reached)
      This method check in the bookshelf gives as parameter if the goals of the Common Goal Cards have been reached. If a goal has been reached the token from the Common Goal Card is updated.
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - is the bookshelf of the player to check
      goal1reached - tells the method if the player has already reached this goal
      goal2reached - tells the method if the player has already reached this goal
      Returns:
      the score of the Token In the Common Goal Card.

    • setFirstDraw

      public void setFirstDraw(int playerNumber)
      This method starts the method to draw and set the Common Goals.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - is the number of player is the game.

    • ChooseFirstPlayerSeat

      public void ChooseFirstPlayerSeat()
      This method set the size of the rounds and chooses the First Player Seat, then it set the start of the index of the ChooseNextPlayer() method to the index of the First Player Seat chosen before.

    • ChooseNextPlayer

      public String ChooseNextPlayer()
      This method return the next player in the player list. If it's at the end of the list it re-starts from index 0.
      Returns:
      the username of the chosen player.

    • checkIfLastTurn

      public boolean checkIfLastTurn(BOOKSHELF bookshelf)
      This method checks if the bookshelf given as parameter is full. If the bookshelf is full the round is set to last. If the bookshelf is full and the player is the First player seat, the ROUND and the TURN is set to last.
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - is the bookshelf of a player.
      Returns:
      true only if it's the last turn.
